name: Abdulwadood Waseem
bio:
Abdulwadood is really good with technical stuff, especially Artificial Intelligence. He's like a problem-solving wizard and has this cool creative side too. He's not just all serious techie stuff – he's a fun and friendly person to be around.

When it comes to sports, Abdulwadood likes to play cricket and badminton. It's pretty awesome how he can switch from coding to playing sports so easily.

Abdulwadood is like a big thinker. He's always imagining how technology can make Pakistan better in the future. It's not just about writing code for him; he sees a future where technology helps our country grow in a positive way.His skills go beyond just computer stuff; he's on a mission to make sure technology plays a big role in making Pakistan a better place.

name: Aamish Rafique
bio:
Prolly the biggest hip-hop fan at VECTOR Inc. with a skillset inclusive of ML, CV, and NLP. I enjoy taking the lead (at basically anything), and doing the heavy lifting. I love to show my creativity through code, music, art, and of course, sarcasm. Always up for a challenge, whether it's diving into a new tech stack or tackling complex algorithms! 

As a visionary I'm driven by the desire to push boundaries and wanting to leave a lasting legacy in the field. I'm also a big believer in the power of continuous learning and am constantly seeking out new skills and knowledge to add to my toolkit.

When I'm not coding or leading, you can find me exploring new restaurants, reading a self-help book, or playing video games. I can gladly say I'm the most fun person at the office. I'm definitely the person to bring along with you on road trips as I have the playlist and humour for any occasion.

name: Shehryar Sohail
bio: Shehryar Sohail manages the Services & Solutions Wing as the face of the company's technological representative. Additionally, he is known to address programming bugs for anyone experiencing them (If you've got some, now is the time to reach out to him :D). As part of his role, he stays updated on the latest technology trends that could be useful to our clients, products or just to have a chat over Chai. He may not often have the time to say it, but he Ioves working with the team and enjoys the vibrant atmosphere that VECTOR consistently provides.

name: Noor ul Wadood Khan
bio:
Noor ul Wadood aka Noor Khan is a Business Savvy, adept at turning coffee into contracts and spreadsheets into smiles! 
He orchestrates strategic initiatives to drive transformative growth and foster innovation. Leveraging cutting-edge technologies and market insights, Noor leads his team in identifying and capitalising on emerging opportunities, building strategic partnerships, and cultivating VECTOR's product portfolio to meet the evolving needs of clients. With a focus on collaboration, excellence, and forward-thinking, Noor is committed to propelling VECTOR to new heights in the dynamic tech landscape. Together, they're not just shaping the future; they're defining it.

name: Khadija Irfan
bio:
Khadija Irfan is a social butterfly with a deep-rooted passion for mathematics, and AI. She is involved in several community building runs and thrives in a collaborative environment. She is an alumnus of the International Student Undergraduate Research Experience at the University of Notre Dame and is currently the Google Developer Student Clubs lead at FAST Islamabad. She teaches mathematics, and computer science to undergraduates and high school students. Another one of her endeavors includes providing professional CVs, and LinkedIn building sessions. 

At VECTOR Inc. she thoroughly enjoys active research and is immensely engaged in the technology industry emerging as an influential figure in her circle. She aims to be a creative professional in Artificial Intelligence working on Intelligent Agents where she will be involved in bringing about innovative new ventures, products, and opportunities for the tech space around her. 

You can catch her at the office making reels, coding, or on a coffee run with her product team :D.

name: Zarmeen Tauseef
bio: Zarmeen Tauseef is a deep learning engineer who turns dreams into reality by sheer force of belief and algorithms. Inspired by the movie 'Big Hero 6,' she is passionate about creating cool tech. And that is exactly what she does at VECTOR Inc.! [Added Note by Management: She loves F1, and dies for good vibes]

name: Saleh Ahmad
bio:
In the expansive domain of digital innovation, where algorithms reign supreme and data flows ceaselessly, Saleh Ahmad emerges as a seasoned professional in the realm of technology. With a comprehensive mastery of coding and a profound understanding of Artificial Intelligence, Saleh navigates the virtual landscape with utmost precision and expertise. His commitment to excellence and unwavering confidence in his craft position him as a trusted leader and innovator in the ever-evolving tech industry.

Saleh Ahmad's passion for crafting intelligent solutions is evident in his ability to push the boundaries of possibility and challenge conventional norms. His dedication to harnessing the power of AI to drive real-world impact reflects his strong belief in the transformative potential of technology. Amidst the complexity of the digital world, Saleh Ahmad remains grounded, finding solace in the tranquility of focused work and the subtle melodies of silence.

As a visionary professional, Saleh Ahmad seamlessly integrates his coding prowess with a keen eye for aesthetics, revolutionizing the way we interact with technology. His contributions to cutting-edge innovation underscore his commitment to shaping the future of AI and redefining the possibilities of digital advancement.

name: Amna Usman
bio:
Amna Usman is a fiend for all things design, user experience, and creative branding. You might catch her browsing through case studies during peak exam season, if you haven’t already caught her memorizing every TikTok sound known to mankind. She also loves teaching coding to children, as well as teaching the elderly how to pass their English Language exams.

Amna believes that behind every successful product lies the brilliance of a product designer who values user experience. "Customer is king," as they say, and Amna thinks no differently. From trying to perfect auto layout on Figma to wrapping her head around Adobe Illustrator, she is always open to learning new things to make any product a hit. She also loves drinking Safilo’s cold coffee, even on a freezing day—especially on a freezing day.

name: Ahmed Raza
bio: As an ML intern at VECTOR, Ahmed brings a diverse range of passions and skills to the table. Hailing proudly from Sialkot, his journey in the realms of artificial intelligence is fueled by curiosity. Alongside his love for AI, he also happens to love the intersection of business strategy and creative content creation, particularly in the realms of IT, photography and videography. He finds immense joy in exploring the latest technologies, always eager to stay ahead of the curve and contribute innovative solutions to our projects. Sci-fi movies are not just a form of entertainment for him; they're a wellspring of inspiration, igniting his imagination and propelling him to push his boundaries. Here, within this dynamic team, he sees boundless opportunities to merge the passions and expertise, driving forward innovation and growth in exciting new ways.

name: Syed Aman Shah
bio: Syed Aman Shah is a person with a range of interests and passions.With a strong passion for both football and bodybuilding, he embodies the spirit of athleticism and determination. Beyond his physical pursuits, he finds joy in delving into the realms of politics, business, history, and economics, constantly seeking to expand his understanding of the world. A dedicated early riser, he cherishes the quiet moments of the morning, often using them to fuel his workouts and set the tone for the day ahead. But what truly sets Syed apart is his unwavering admiration for revolutionaries like Che Guevara, Mandela, and the stirring verses of poets like Allama Muhammad Iqbal. Their courage and vision serve as a guiding light, inspiring him to embrace change and strive for a better tomorrow.

name: Maaz Ali Nadeem
bio:
"Start unknown and finish unforgettable"  A line Maaz often rolls back to, and resonates with when asked about what keeps him going.  Maaz is a nerd - turned - community builder - turned - (entrepreneur?) who has evolved from wanting to build software to now building a business around it! 

Maaz enjoys the practice of being a peoples' person being at the forefront of the business strategy, personal branding and morning tone setting before the day at VECTOR starts. Maaz loves to practice, two inspirational but un-related concepts; Stoicism and Alchemy where these him navigate through acceptance, meaning and passion.

name: Sabah Nawab
bio: Sabah Nawab is a remix of a cricketer by passion, an intermittent DJ by soul and an AI engineer by profession. she welcomes the ever-changing nature of her interests and the skill of multitasking. [Note from management: One thing that she is sure of is her killer-attitude that makes sure to get sh*t done when it matters!]

name: Isaam Ansari
bio: Isaam Ansari is an enthusiast at whatever he puts his mind to; whether it's interacting & excelling in the local tech community or identifying global trends in AI & trying to replicate them at home or cat reels. Isaam is passionate about everything he loves. The world of computing and specifically AI has always fascinated him, and he envisions a future where AI products designed & developed by him can perhaps progress humanity forward or at least leave an everlasting impact in the world of technology.

name: Fakhir Ali
bio:
Fakhir has a way with words when it comes to talking to computers [Note by management: If Fakhir had a mother-tongue, it would be Python]
Fakhir believes that internet is all you need to learn anything.
The above two things take up most of Fakhir's time.

Now let's see what GPT says about him :D
Meet Fakhir, a wordsmith with a knack for conversing with computers. With an unwavering belief that the internet is the ultimate source of knowledge, Fakhir spends most of his time immersed in its endless depths, seeking to learn anything and everything it has to offer. Whether he's crafting code or delving into digital realms, Fakhir's passion for technology and learning knows no bounds. With a keen eye for innovation and a dedication to constant growth, he's always ready to explore new horizons and harness the power of the online world to fuel his curiosity and creativity.
